name: UnitConverter
desc: An abstract class that provides a description of how to convert a unit to and from the base unit of its dimension.

items.name: func baseUnitValue(fromValue: Double) -> Double
items.desc: For a given unit, returns the specified value of that unit in terms of the base unit of its dimension.

items.name: func value(fromBaseUnitValue: Double) -> Double
items.desc: For a given unit, returns the specified value of the base unit in terms of that unit.
